Interact once , display many times : Smartwatches should primarily provide displays of information and prompts for action rather than providing rich interactive elements , meaning they will show lots of information that is passively consumed .

A1: displays of information and prompts for action

Interact once , display many times : Smartwatches should primarily provide displays of information and prompts for action rather than providing rich interactive elements , meaning they will show lots of information that is passively consumed .

Speed over accuracy : Consumer smartwatches should be flexible , fun , in-the-moment companions , which means they should make lots of ignorable suggestions rather than waiting to make a few suggestions that it deems perfectly right , as current predictive services do .

Speed over accuracy : Consumer smartwatches should be flexible , fun , in-the-moment companions , which means they should make lots of ignorable suggestions rather than waiting to make a few suggestions that it deems perfectly right , as current predictive services do .

Pass the hallucination test : Smartwatch use can be perceived as novel behavior , but it ca n't present like Bluetooth headsets , which make it impossible to know who is on the phone and who is screaming at an imaginary friend on the street .
